title: Risk Assurance - IAS/PA Intern
content: Met with engineers and program managers at leading Silicon Valley tech firms to document an understanding of their engineering processes and identify potential security and inefficiency risks
Created first-year workpapers for IT understanding of startup client
Performed associate-level work at associate-level quality for three different teams concurrently

title: Director of Bruin Mobile
content: As first ever student director, restructured marketing and tech departments into a single mobile development studio to increase synergy for the organization’s mobile efforts, and established procedures and long-term design vision to ensure continuity for future generations
Also served as de-facto chief evangelist by promoting strategic vision to clients and employees, creating the necessary inspiration

title: Publications Accountant
content: Spent at least 10 hours a week on top of the 20 hours already worked in tech; wrote journal entries, account reconciliations, and performed check runs
Supported year-end PwC financial auditors by researching past transactions and providing relevant documentation
Used experience from working in tech to propose changes in budgeting, reducing overhead and financial waste for the organization’s web media and mobile departments

title: Chief Technology Officer
content: Lead designer and developer on proprietary AppGet mobile app development system, spending at least 20 hours a week meeting with design and marketing teams in order to reconcile user experience design vision with the company’s business demands
Performed consulting services for other university media teams, training other schools’ tech staffs in working with the proprietary AppGet app development platform
Created and organized tech department internship, increasing cost-efficient student-based staff to decrease dependence on costly outside programmers
Spearheaded development on ad sales module and authentication system, personally taking the time to implement large sections of code
Worked with IT to improve the organization’s technical efficiency, replacing time-consuming CD backup system with network-linked redundant storage file system

title: Marketing Intern
content: Utilized social media resources to create and engage with customers, increasing downloads on assigned application by 30% over the three-month internship
Demonstrated the potential for third-party app channels in the organization's app-development platform, allowing group to extend mobile application functionalities through inexpensive web frameworks

title: Co-Founder/Chief Financial Officer
content: Organized the education-oriented mobile startup ExEquals and outlined the organization’s vision, including the company’s product, marketing and monetization strategies, accounting system, and operating staff hierarchy
Learned to recruit and motivate the team to work without monetary incentives, finishing the minimum viable product in just under 3 months
Refined monetization strategy and contacted mobile advertising firms to add new forms of monetization, doubling revenue over a 5-month period
